excerpts.title: Finding the right style
excerpts.body:
At Base Creative we’re doing a series of blog posts and video blogs (“vlogs” - I’m not sure that’ll catch on) about our website design strategy. That’s the process we go through with our clients and especially the initial meetings. In my latest post I discuss a specific technique we use in the strategy meeting:

One way which […]

excerpts.title: dbushell.com v4
excerpts.body:
Eagle-eyed viewers may notice that dbushell.com is looking a bit different!
I haven’t gone for a full overhaul just a little realigning, better typography and a new logo-thingy. My old design has served me very well over the last year - it was featured on quite a few design blogs. But it was looking a bit […]

excerpts.title: Minimalist HTML?
excerpts.body:
As part of the ongoing Design Heroes project we’ve started to include longer reviews with juicier content! The latest feature is on web designer and strategist Giuseppe Scappaticcio and his glorious website (and it’s source!). Read the review on Design Heroes, see a snippet below:

“Really conserve your HTML as if it’s a non-renewable source. Give […]

excerpts.title: 7 things I hate about…
excerpts.body:
Website Design and Development!
I started writing a blog about all the cool things being a web designer has to offer, i.e. ever changing technologies (slicker browsers, screens with pixels pushed closer together, HTML5, CSS3 with shadows and rounded corners everywhere etc). But then I figured people have already done a better job than I could […]
